attributes.action: consider and enact ways through legislation in which religious leaders are allowed to continue to voice their thoughts but do so in a way as to allow the proper functioning of debate in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Catholic Church is opposed to the Human Embryo and Fertilisation Bill and appears to be spreading mistruth about it.  These men are childless, potentially virgins who can have no concept of the love brought to a relationship by children.  They ought to be allowed to speak but must be held to account for their words and deeds.  Perhaps through elections to the House of Lords and only elected representatives may have a national voice.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
